original_text: And the king of Israel answered and said, Tell him, Let not him that girdeth on his harness boast himself as he that putteth it off.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 대답하여 이르되 갑옷 입는 자가 갑옷 벗는 자 같이 자랑하지 못할 것이라 하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And the king of Israel answered and said,
Let not him that girdeth on his harness boast himself
sentences.korean_translation: 갑옷을 입는 자가 자신을 자랑하지 말게 하라

sentences.original_text: as he that putteth it off.
